io.tessilab.oss.openutils.locker

Class JobLocker<JOBTYPE extends JobParameter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tessilab.oss.openutils.locker.JobLocker<JOBTYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    JOBTYPE - : The job type we are locking

    public class JobLocker<JOBTYPE extends JobParameter>
extends Object
    The class that use a DAO to lock jobs, in for example a parallel context execution.
    Author:
    Andres BEL ALONSO

    • Constructor Detail

      • JobLocker

        public JobLocker(DAO dao,
                 String pID,
                 boolean doNonEndedJobs,
                 long tooOldLock)
        Parameters:
        dao - The object allowing to access to the database
        pID - The id of the process that will use the joblocker
        doNonEndedJobs - : true if we will do non ended job to are locked for too long
        tooOldLock - : How much MILISECONDS must pass to consider that a job is too old. A negative value will be transformed in 0

    • Method Detail

        Sets the time to wait between each step of the process.
        Parameters:
        time - : The time in seconds

        public boolean isLockingJob()

        Returns:

      • isEndedJob

        public boolean isEndedJob(JOBTYPE job)
        Parameters:
        job - The job to verify if is ended or not
        Returns:
        True if the job passed in argument is marqued as ended or not in the database.
